entry.summary:
Author: BarleyAZHolm

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,857Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 58

Summary: A long-kept secret unravels when the Batfamily learns Jason has a daughter. Dick is thrown back to a night he tried to forget. entry.title: Nightwing & Red Hood: Snow Birds
entry.summary:
Author: Robin Spotter (robinspotter)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 139,647Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 217

Summary: ***Choose Not To Use Archive Warnings under an abundance of caution. You have been warned that everything or nothing at all that personally squicks or offends you may be in this fic!*** At the end of the Joker War, Dick Grayson regained a lifetime of memories, but the mind is a twisty place. How can he reconcile a lifetime's worth of traumas when the memories have returned in agonizing detail as if they happened yesterday? How can he go forward when he remembers everything that he had ever let himself forget?Jason Todd was a teenager when his life was stolen from him in explosive violence. He has walked a long, lonely, and bitter path home to Gotham. With a new resolve not to kill, he still hangs on the fringes of tenuous ties with the Batman family. Until Dick's spiraling descent crashes into him full throttle, forcing him to confront long denied feelings.When circumstance leads them into a marriage of convenience, will they be able to overcome together what neither could overcome alone?

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 185,033Chapters: 39/53Kudos: 1,422

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,338Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 168

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.

entry.title: What It Sounds Like
entry.summary:
Author: UltraCaffeinatedIvy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,519Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Things are mostly looking up for Jason Todd. He’s finally earned a scholarship to Gotham Academy and has a place that actually feels like home. He knows it's not some kind of cosmic reward for getting through a rough past, living through Catherine's addictions, his dad up and disappearing, or any of the other shit he's had to put up with. You get dealt your hand in life, for better or —more likley— worse, and try to make the best of it. Then Dick Grayson steps in. Or Where Pamela Isley adopts Jason Todd. Enrolls him in Gotham Academy and Jason struggles being a normal teenager, having friends and, of course, falls in love with Dick Grayson in the process. A coming of age story.
